summary: Completed comprehensive testing of hunting safety web app features including containment detection, notification system, and UI integration. All major functionalities are working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Unread count badge not visible during testing
design_issues.note: May be due to all notifications already being read

passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/check-intersection with route inside zone returns conflict_type='contained' and 100% overlap
Backend: POST /api/check-intersection with route crossing zone returns conflict_type='intersects'
Backend: POST /api/check-intersection with route outside zones returns intersects=false
Backend: GET /api/notifications returns user notifications correctly
Backend: PUT /api/notifications/{id}/read marks notification as read
Backend: PUT /api/notifications/read-all marks all notifications as read
Frontend: /notifications page loads with proper notification inbox
Frontend: Notification cards show conflict type badges (contained=red badges visible)
Frontend: Notification bell icon in navbar navigates to notifications page
Frontend: Routes page shows hunting zones on map (3 zones confirmed)
Frontend: Routes page intersection result functionality works
Frontend: Route upload area and list functionality present
Frontend: Map container and zone visibility toggle working
